prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon that resembles a menacing bird with a dark color palette.
Imagine a Pokemon with striking red and blue wings, perfect for soaring high in the sky.
Design a powerful, intimidating flying Pokemon with a strong presence and a large wingspan.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a cunning and clever creature in the wild.
Generate a majestic bird Pokemon that rules the skies with elegance and ferocity.
Give me a Pokemon that has a sleek, predatory look with a color scheme of deep blues and reds.
Make a Pokemon that is known for its strategic mind and commanding nature in battles.
